game.name: Sylphy and the Sleepless Island
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: One day, professional thief Sylphy learns of the mystical and valuable artifact of the Kingdom of Diezel, but the mission goes sideways and she ends up robbing the island of its night! She has one week to right her wrongs in this action-filled RPG!
game.shortDescriptionEn: One day, professional thief Sylphy learns of the mystical and valuable artifact of the Kingdom of Diezel, but the mission goes sideways and she ends up robbing the island of its night! She has one week to right her wrongs in this action-filled RPG!

reviewHighlights.text: 패치 링크 : https://www.kaguragames.com/product/sylphy-and-the-sleepless-island-patch/ 특이하게 시간 제한이 있는 게임. 다만 어떤 행동을 하거나 퀘스트를 위해 필드에 나가 있는게 아닌 마을에서는 시간이 흐르...
cg개수 의상개수가 상당함. 볼륨도 꽤 큰편인데 시간 제한이 있다보니 1회차에 모든 씬을 다보면서 진엔딩 보는게 은근 빡셈. 적당히 보다가 엔딩을 본후 갤러리 해금기능을 쓰거나 스탯과 돈을 계승한뒤 2회차에 올해금을 노리자.
